title: FTX claims prices rally ahead of anticipated estimation hearing
description:
While FTX is keen on refunding the investors based on Nov. 2022 market prices, FTX creditors aim for an "in-kind” repayment structure that bases the repayments on the number of tokens, not their market prices.

Prices of claims on the crypto exchange FTX have increased ahead of a Jan. 25 estimation hearing, where creditors expect the ruling to favor their demand for “in kind” repayments in cryptocurrency.

FTX claims are now trading at almost 80 cents to the dollar, according to Cherokee Acquisition, an investment banking firm that specializes in bankruptcy claims and is providing liquidity on FTX claims.

According to a Bloomberg report, the FTX estate held 22.28 million shares (worth $902 million at the time) of the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust before Jan. 11, when the trust was converted into a spot exchange-traded fund (ETF).

Read more

title: Crypto Firms Argue Rules for Crypto Mixers Are a ‘Waste of Time’
description: Cryptocurrency firms, including Coinbase, Consensys, and Paradigm, are calling on the US Treasury to review its proposed reporting requirement for crypto mixers. The firms all argue they drain resources, lack specificity, and are a “waste of time.”

title: Brad Mills Reflects on Bitcoin ‘Season 2’ — A New Era of Monetary and Platform Coexistence
description: Brad Mills discusses the Bitcoin “Season 2” narrative, a phase that signifies a coexistence and rivalry between the traditional monetary maximalists and the newly emerging platform maximalists. title: SEC grilled as Binance challenges crypto securities label
description: In a recent court hearing legal representatives from Binance, the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchange, squared off against lawyers from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).  The focus of this legal battle revolves around whether certain cryptocurrencies should be classified as securities or not. The outcome of this case could have far-reaching implications for […]

title: Sneaky malware targeting MacOS users via pirated apps uncovered
description: A renowned cybersecurity firm has recently uncovered a sophisticated malware campaign targeting MacOS users who download pirated apps from unauthorized sources.  This malware infiltrates users’ computers through compromised software installers and replaces their legitimate Bitcoin and Exodus crypto wallets with infected versions.  While the hackers are still actively developing this malware, there are essential steps […]

title: Ethereum Slumps As Celsius Transfers 13K ETH to Coinbase and FalconX
description:
Lookonchain, the smartmoney on-chain platform, has reported significant ETH transfers involving crypto whales and the embattled crypto lender Celsius. According to Lookonchain, Celsius appears to have continued with the recent practice of making significant deposits to centralized exchanges. The smartmoney on-chain platform posted details of large ETH withdrawals from some top exchanges in the last […]

The post Ethereum Slumps As Celsius Transfers 13K ETH to Coinbase and FalconX appeared first on Coin Edition.
